meanings.sent1: Her misdoing caused trouble for everyone involved.
meanings.sent2: The misdoing of the student was quickly addressed by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The misdoing of the cat knocking over the vase was met with a stern 'no'.
meanings.sent4: The misdoing of the storm left a path of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The misdoing of the chef resulted in a burnt dinner for the guests.

meanings.definition: An act of misconduct or wrongdoing
meanings.sent1: The misdoing of the employee led to their dismissal from the company.
meanings.sent2: The investigation revealed the misdoing of the group involved in the scandal.
meanings.sent3: The misdoing of the squirrel stealing nuts from the bird feeder was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The misdoing of the wind whispered secrets through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The misdoing of the clock striking thirteen puzzled the townspeople.
